Posts.Content: Jul 20, 2017 09:57AM Leeen wrote: Hi 4pink101, I hope you are healthy and enjoying life! I saw your question from a couple of years ago that (unfortunately) wasn't answered. I am in that same situation now. I had a bmx w/ one step silicone reconstruction on June 27th. Did your skin/implants come out of rads ok? How long after surgery did the Drs wait to start rads? Do you have any advice for me? Thank you so much! Leee
Posts.Title: Radiation after BMX/immediate implant reconstruction 4pink101 KBeee
